title: CIS 18 Critical Security Controls
description: Implementation of CIS 18 Critical Security Controls

control1.title: Inventory and Control of Enterprise Assets
control1.description: Actively manage all enterprise assets connected to the infrastructure

control2.title: Inventory and Control of Software Assets
control2.description: Actively manage all software on the network

control3.title: Data Protection
control3.description: Develop processes and technical controls to identify, classify, and protect data

control4.title: Secure Configuration of Enterprise Assets and Software

control5.title: Account Management
control5.description: Use processes and tools to manage user accounts

control6.title: Access Control Management
control6.description: Use processes and tools to create, assign, manage, and revoke access credentials

control7.title: Continuous Vulnerability Management
control7.description: Develop a plan to continuously assess and track vulnerabilities

control8.title: Audit Log Management
control8.description: Collect, alert, review, and retain audit logs

control9.title: Email and Web Browser Protections
control9.description: Improve protections and detections against email and web attack vectors

control10.title: Malware Defenses
control10.description: Prevent or control the installation, spread, and execution of malicious applications

control11.title: Data Recovery
control11.description: Establish and maintain data recovery practices

control12.title: Network Infrastructure Management
control12.description: Establish, implement, and actively manage network devices

control13.title: Network Monitoring and Defense
control13.description: Operate processes and tools to establish and maintain network monitoring

control14.title: Security Awareness and Skills Training
control14.description: Establish and maintain a security awareness program

control15.title: Service Provider Management
control15.description: Develop process to evaluate service providers

control16.title: Application Software Security
control16.description: Manage the security lifecycle of internally developed software

control17.title: Incident Response Management
control17.description: Establish a program to develop and maintain incident response capability

control18.title: Penetration Testing
control18.description: Test the effectiveness and resiliency of enterprise assets
